author: iasonkrom
body:
#### PR description:

Same as PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43247

#### Backport:

This PR is a backport of PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43247. Backport is required for the production of NanoAODv13 from CMSSW_13.
title: [CMSSW_13_3_X backport] Add CaloIdL_MW seeded filter and split the legs of CaloIdL_TrackIdL_IsoVL filter on nanoAOD filterBits
